post:
Hey LET,

At [VPN.sh](http://www.vpn.sh) we're proud to announce 9 new locations! We recently [engaged the community](http://www.lowendtalk.com/discussion/9231/vpn.sh-market-research) when asking about new locations, and hope that some of our new locations appeal to you!

Our packages consist of a 20GB/month bandwidth package, and a 100GB/month bandwidth package.

20GB Package: £2/per month **(£1 with offer code)** OR **£5.28/year** with yearly offer code 
[Order Link](https://www.vpn.sh/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=1)

100GB Package: £5/per month **(£2.50 with offer code)** OR **£13.20/year** with yearly offer code
[Order Link](https://www.vpn.sh/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=3)

All VPN accounts have access to _PPTP_, _L2TP_ and _OpenVPN_.

Locations:

+ USA x2 (both Chicago)
+ Germany x2 (Frankfurt and Dusseldorf)
+ UK
+ Canada
+ Switzerland
+ Iceland
+ Italy
+ Netherlands

A special offer code is available for LET users to get **50% off monthly** orders: **LETLOCATIONS**

You can also get 67% off when purchasing yearly using the offer code: **LETLOCATIONSYEARLY**

Thanks!

Visit our [Website](http://www.vpn.sh)
Like us on [Facebook](http://www.facebook.com/vpndotsh)
Follow us on [Twitter](http://www.twitter.com/vpnsh)
